block.createheat.copycat_thermal_block.t: Applies _held item_ as its _material_ if possible. _Click again_ to open _Interface_ according to _material_. Use a _Wrench_ to _reset_ the material.
createheat.configuration.title: Create:Heat Configs
createheat.configuration.allow_passive_h: Allow passive heat source to be calculated
createheat.configuration.allow_generate_: Allow non super heat sources to generate super heat source
createheat.configuration.allow_super_hea: Allow super heat sources reproduce more super sources
createheat.configuration.max_connect_ran: Max range between blocks can be connected
createheat.configuration.connect_block_t: Should blocks have connected texture.(Client only)
createheat.configuration.allow_passive_h: Allow passive heat source to be calculated
createheat.configuration.allow_generate_: Allow non super heat sources to generate super heat source
createheat.configuration.allow_super_hea: Allow super heat sources reproduce more super sources
createheat.configuration.max_connect_ran: Max range between blocks can be connected
createheat.configuration.connect_block_t: Should blocks have connected texture.(Client only)
createheat.ponder.thermal_block.use.head: Using Thermal Block
createheat.ponder.thermal_block.use.text: Thermal Block provide heat for machines above
Some passive heat sources can generate regular heat source
Some regular heat sources can generate super heat source
When the provided heat exceed the consumed heat
The excess heat will be stored
The stored heat will be released
createheat.ponder.thermal_block.recipe.t: Some block can be turn into another block by heating
Some recipes require more heat to continue processing
createheat.ponder.ice_and_fire.use.text_: Dragon Fire Input can turn dragon fire into heat
Place any Dragon Forge Bricks next to Dragon Fire Input to select dragon type you want
Dragon Fire Input will provide heat
createheat.ponder.thermal_block.smart_th: You can configure the max heat level with the value panel
When max heat level is "No Heat"
When max heat level is "Regular Heat", ...
it will provide heat not higher than "Regular Heat" level
When max heat level is "Super Heat", ...
it will provide heat not higher than "Super Heat" level
